color_warning.name: color_warning
color_warning.title: Status Warning
color_warning.description: Warning orange (non-accessible) is only used in special cases like form validation and messaging.

color_gray_darker.name: color_gray_darker
color_gray_darker.title: Gray Darker
color_gray_darker.description: Darker gray that is accessible with white when used for text. Most commonly used as a text color for interface help texts.

color_gray_lighter.name: color_gray_lighter
color_gray_lighter.title: Gray Lighter
color_gray_lighter.description: Light gray that is accessible with secondary blue. For consistency, we use this common grayscale palette throughout the interface.

color_category_home.name: color_category_home
color_category_home.title: Category Home
color_category_home.description: Home category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the home product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

color_primary.name: color_primary
color_primary.title: Primary Blue
color_primary.description: Primary digital blue that is accessible with white. Used as primary button background color, selected state background color, and as link text color.

color_category_vehicle.name: color_category_vehicle
color_category_vehicle.title: Category Vehicle
color_category_vehicle.description: Vehicle category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the vehicle/mobility product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

color_success.name: color_success
color_success.title: Status Success
color_success.description: Success green that is accessible with white. Only used in special cases like form validation and messaging.

color_category_family.name: color_category_family
color_category_family.title: Category Family
color_category_family.description: Family category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the family product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

color_primary_lightest.name: color_primary_lightest
color_primary_lightest.title: Primary Blue Lightest
color_primary_lightest.description: Light blue that is 5% tint of the primary blue. Accessible when secondary blue is used as the text color. Commonly used to indicate a hover state of item with white background.

color_primary_lighter.name: color_primary_lighter
color_primary_lighter.title: Primary Blue Lighter
color_primary_lighter.description: Light blue that is 10% tint of the primary blue. Accessible when secondary blue is used as the text color. Used for the dark end of background gradients.

color_brand_blue.name: color_brand_blue
color_brand_blue.title: Brand Blue
color_brand_blue.description: Non-accessible brand blue that is used in LocalTapiola logo and print materials.

color_primary_dark.name: color_primary_dark
color_primary_dark.title: Primary Blue Dark
color_primary_dark.description: Dark version of primary blue that is accessible with white. Most commonly used to indicate hover and active states of an item with primary blue background.

color_gray_lightest.name: color_gray_lightest
color_gray_lightest.title: Gray Lightest
color_gray_lightest.description: White is used as the primary page background color and primary container background color.

color_category_finance.name: color_category_finance
color_category_finance.title: Category Finance
color_category_finance.description: Finance category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the finance product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

color_gray_dark.name: color_gray_dark
color_gray_dark.title: Gray Dark
color_gray_dark.description: Dark gray is used for form borders that need to pass WCAG Level AA non-text contrast requirements. Please note that this color isn’t accessible when used for text.

color_gray_light.name: color_gray_light
color_gray_light.title: Gray Light
color_gray_light.description: Light gray that is accessible with secondary blue. For consistency, we use this common grayscale palette throughout the interface.

color_secondary.name: color_secondary
color_secondary.title: Secondary Blue
color_secondary.description: Secondary blue that is accessible with light, lighter and lightest primary blue. Used as the body text color.

color_category_pet.name: color_category_pet
color_category_pet.title: Category Pet
color_category_pet.description: Pet category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the pet product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

color_primary_light.name: color_primary_light
color_primary_light.title: Primary Blue Light
color_primary_light.description: Light blue that is 20% tint of the primary blue. Accessible when secondary blue is used as the text color. Used for date hovers and in-between date ranges.

color_category_travel.name: color_category_travel
color_category_travel.title: Category Travel
color_category_travel.description: Travel category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the travel product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

color_gray.name: color_gray
color_gray.title: Gray
color_gray.description: Gray that is accessible with secondary blue. For consistency, we use this common grayscale palette throughout the interface.

color_danger.name: color_danger
color_danger.title: Status Danger
color_danger.description: Danger red that is accessible with white. Only used in special cases like form validation and messaging.

color_gray_darker_turva.name: color_gray_darker_turva
color_gray_darker_turva.title: Gray Darker
color_gray_darker_turva.description: Dark gray that is accessible with white. Most commonly used as selected tab button background color.

color_gray_lighter_turva.title: Gray Lighter
color_gray_lighter_turva.description: Light gray that is accessible with secondary black. For consistency, we use this common grayscale palette throughout the interface.

color_primary_lightest_turva.name: color_primary_lightest_turva

color_primary_lightest_turva.description: Light red that is 5% tint of the primary red. Accessible when secondary black is used as the text color. Commonly used to indicate a hover state of item with white background.

color_category_family_turva.name: color_category_family_turva

color_category_family_turva.description: Family category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the family product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

color_category_union_turva.name: color_category_union_turva

color_primary_lighter_turva.description: Light red that is 10% tint of the primary red. Accessible when secondary black is used as the text color.

color_primary_dark_turva.name: color_primary_dark_turva
color_primary_dark_turva.title: Primary Red Dark
color_primary_dark_turva.description: Dark version of primary red that is accessible with white. Most commonly used to indicate hover and active states of an item with primary red background.

color_gray_lightest_turva.name: color_gray_lightest_turva

color_gray_dark_turva.name: color_gray_dark_turva

color_gray_light_turva.name: color_gray_light_turva

color_primary_light_turva.name: color_primary_light_turva

font_weight_bold.name: font_weight_bold
font_weight_bold.title: Font Weight: Bold
font_weight_bold.description: Bold font weight is used for headings only together with “Heading” font family.

font_weight_normal.title: Font Weight: Normal
font_weight_normal.description: Normal font weight is used for body text and form inputs together with “Text” font family.
font_weight_normal.name: font_weight_normal

font_weight_semi_bold.title: Font Weight: Semi Bold
font_weight_semi_bold.description: Semi bold font weight is used for buttons and sub headings together with “Text” font family.
font_weight_semi_bold.name: font_weight_semi_bold

font_size_xxxx_large.name: font_size_xxxx_large
font_size_xxxx_large.title: Font Size: XXXX-Large
font_size_xxxx_large.description: XXXX-large font size is for marketing purposes and banners.

font_size_xxx_large.name: font_size_xxx_large
font_size_xxx_large.title: Font Size: XXX-Large
font_size_xxx_large.description: XXX-large font size is used for the main heading on desktop.

font_size_xx_large.name: font_size_xx_large
font_size_xx_large.title: Font Size: XX-Large
font_size_xx_large.description: XX-large font size is used for the main heading on tablet size.

font_size_x_large.name: font_size_x_large
font_size_x_large.title: Font Size: X-Large
font_size_x_large.description: X-large font size is used for large sub-headings.

font_size_large.name: font_size_large
font_size_large.title: Font Size: Large
font_size_large.description: Large font size is used for small sub-headings.

font_size_medium.name: font_size_medium
font_size_medium.title: Font Size: Medium
font_size_medium.description: Medium font size is used for the body text.

font_size_small.name: font_size_small
font_size_small.title: Font Size: Small
font_size_small.description: Small font size should be used sparingly for annotations, descriptions, and similar content.

font_size_x_small.name: font_size_x_small
font_size_x_small.title: Font Size: X-Small
font_size_x_small.description: X-Small font size that is only used in native iOS and Android applications.

radius_sharp.title: Border Radius: Sharp
radius_sharp.description: Sharp border-radius resets the corners to be sharp with no rounding.
radius_sharp.name: radius_sharp

radius_default.title: Border Radius: Default
radius_default.description: Default border-radius is used in interface containers, form inputs, textareas, and similar. If you’re unsure which radius to use, pick the default.
radius_default.name: radius_default

radius_circle.title: Border Radius: Circle
radius_circle.description: Circle border-radius is used as icon background shape and as avatar shape.
radius_circle.name: radius_circle

radius_pill.title: Border Radius: Pill
radius_pill.description: Pill border-radius is the default radius for buttons, tags, tabs, and similar.
radius_pill.name: radius_pill

shadow_tooltip_turva.name: shadow_tooltip_turva
shadow_tooltip_turva.title: Shadow: Tooltip
shadow_tooltip_turva.description: Tooltip shadow is used by popover tooltips.

shadow_tooltip.name: shadow_tooltip
shadow_tooltip.title: Shadow: Tooltip
shadow_tooltip.description: Tooltip shadow is used by popover tooltips.

shadow_card_turva.name: shadow_card_turva
shadow_card_turva.title: Shadow: Card
shadow_card_turva.description: Card shadow is a variant of default shadow that is used when information needs to be contained within a card.

shadow_modal.title: Shadow: Modal
shadow_modal.description: Modal shadow is used for popovers and modal windows on a dark blue overlay.
shadow_modal.name: shadow_modal

shadow_card.name: shadow_card
shadow_card.title: Shadow: Card
shadow_card.description: Card shadow is a variant of default shadow that is used when information needs to be contained within a card.

shadow_hover_turva.name: shadow_hover_turva
shadow_hover_turva.title: Shadow: Hover
shadow_hover_turva.description: Hover shadow is used when primary component is clickable and is hovered over/active on mobile.

shadow_hover.name: shadow_hover
shadow_hover.title: Shadow: Hover
shadow_hover.description: Hover shadow is used when primary component is clickable and is hovered over/active on mobile.

shadow_default_turva.name: shadow_default_turva
shadow_default_turva.title: Shadow: Default
shadow_default_turva.description: Default shadow is used when information needs to be contained within a component.

space_xx_small.name: space_xx_small
space_xx_small.title: Space: XX-Small
space_xx_small.description: XX-small space is used when the space is limited.

space_large.name: space_large
space_large.title: Space: Large
space_large.description: Large space is most commonly used as an empty space between two components.

space_x_small.name: space_x_small
space_x_small.title: Space: X-Small
space_x_small.description: X-small space is used when the space is limited.

space_xxx_small.name: space_xxx_small
space_xxx_small.title: Space: XXX-Small
space_xxx_small.description: XXX-small space is used when the space is limited.

space_small.name: space_small
space_small.title: Space: Small
space_small.description: Small space is used when the space is limited and for example in popover datepicker.

space_xx_large.name: space_xx_large
space_xx_large.title: Space: XX-Large
space_xx_large.description: XX-large space is used as horizontal padding in buttons and as an empty space between two elements.

space_xxxx_large.name: space_xxxx_large
space_xxxx_large.title: Space: XXXX-Large
space_xxxx_large.description: XXXX-large space is used as an empty space between two elements.

space_xxxxx_large.name: space_xxxxx_large
space_xxxxx_large.title: Space: XXXXX-Large
space_xxxxx_large.description: XXXXX-large space is used as spacer on modals.

space_xxx_large.name: space_xxx_large
space_xxx_large.title: Space: XXX-Large
space_xxx_large.description: XXX-large space is used as an empty space between two elements.

space_x_large.name: space_x_large
space_x_large.title: Space: X-Large
space_x_large.description: X-large space is used as an empty space between two elements.

size_icon_xx_large.name: size_icon_xx_large
size_icon_xx_large.title: Size: Icon XX-Large
size_icon_xx_large.description: XX-large icon size is used in components as a visual element.

size_form_border.title: Size: Form Border
size_form_border.description: Form border size is used to set a consistent borders for form elements.
size_form_border.name: size_form_border

size_step_medium.title: Size: Step Medium
size_step_medium.description: Medium step size is used for stepper circles that have icon inside them (desktop viewports).
size_step_medium.name: size_step_medium

size_button_min_width.title: Size: Button Min Width
size_button_min_width.description: Button min width size is used to set the minimum width for button elements.
size_button_min_width.name: size_button_min_width

size_header.title: Size: Header
size_header.description: Header size (64px) is used for the header height on mobile, tablet and desktop viewports.
size_header.name: size_header

size_icon_xxx_large.name: size_icon_xxx_large
size_icon_xxx_large.title: Size: Icon XXX-Large
size_icon_xxx_large.description: XXX-large icon size is used for insurance categories in desktop and to visualise feedback overlays.

size_icon_x_large.name: size_icon_x_large
size_icon_x_large.title: Size: Icon X-Large
size_icon_x_large.description: X-large icon size is used as product level icons.

size_icon_xx_small.name: size_icon_xx_small
size_icon_xx_small.title: Size: Icon XX-Small
size_icon_xx_small.description: XX-small icon size is used when the space is limited.

size_step_small.title: Size: Step Small
size_step_small.description: Small step size is used for stepper circles that have icon inside them (mobile viewports).
size_step_small.name: size_step_small

size_navigation.title: Size: Navigation
size_navigation.description: Navigation size (48px) is used for the navigation height on desktop viewports.
size_navigation.name: size_navigation

size_icon_large.name: size_icon_large
size_icon_large.title: Size: Icon Large
size_icon_large.description: Large icon size is used for insurance categories in mobile, small product levels, and card icons.

size_layout_max_width.title: Size: Layout Max-Width
size_layout_max_width.description: This size is used as the max-width for all layouts on the Web.
size_layout_max_width.name: size_layout_max_width

size_tappable_square.title: Size: Tappable Square
size_tappable_square.description: A minimum recommended touch target size is 48 device independent pixels on a website with a properly set mobile viewport.
size_tappable_square.name: size_tappable_square

size_icon_x_small.name: size_icon_x_small
size_icon_x_small.title: Size: Icon X-Small
size_icon_x_small.description: X-small icon size is used when the space is limited.

size_icon_xxx_small.name: size_icon_xxx_small
size_icon_xxx_small.title: Size: Icon XXX-Small
size_icon_xxx_small.description: XXX-small icon size is used when the space is limited.

size_button_border.title: Size: Button Border
size_button_border.description: Button border size is used to set a consistent borders for buttons.
size_button_border.name: size_button_border

size_button_tiny_border.title: Size: Button Tiny Border
size_button_tiny_border.description: Button tiny border size is used to set a consistent borders for action buttons - that contain only icons.
size_button_tiny_border.name: size_button_tiny_border

size_icon_medium.name: size_icon_medium
size_icon_medium.title: Size: Icon Medium
size_icon_medium.description: Medium icon size is the standard icon size. Used for example in primary selections.

size_icon_small.name: size_icon_small
size_icon_small.title: Size: Icon Small
size_icon_small.description: Small icon size is used with text links, buttons, inside forms, and in global navigation.

z_index_mask_buttons.title: Z-Index: Mask Buttons
z_index_mask_buttons.description: Default z-index for buttons that should overlap masking interface elements.
z_index_mask_buttons.name: z_index_mask_buttons

z_index_dropdown.title: Z-Index: Dropdown
z_index_dropdown.description: Default z-index for dropdowns which makes sure the dropdown stacks above toasts and sticky elements.
z_index_dropdown.name: z_index_dropdown

z_index_spinner.title: Z-Index: Spinner
z_index_spinner.description: Default z-index for spinners, stacking on top of overlay.
z_index_spinner.name: z_index_spinner

z_index_default.title: Z-Index: Default
z_index_default.description: The default z-index for components and elements inside components.
z_index_default.name: z_index_default

z_index_popup.title: Z-Index: Popup
z_index_popup.description: Default z-index for popups that stacks on top of all other elements.
z_index_popup.name: z_index_popup

z_index_modal.title: Z-Index: Modal
z_index_modal.description: Default z-index for modals that stacks on top of overlays and other elements, but still allows popups to be visible.
z_index_modal.name: z_index_modal

z_index_sticky.title: Z-Index: Sticky
z_index_sticky.description: Default z-index for sticky interface elements.
z_index_sticky.name: z_index_sticky

z_index_masked.title: Z-Index: Masked
z_index_masked.description: Default z-index for masked interface elements.
z_index_masked.name: z_index_masked

z_index_deep.title: Z-Index: Deep
z_index_deep.description: Deep z-index is used to stack something behind everything else.
z_index_deep.name: z_index_deep

z_index_overlay.title: Z-Index: Overlay
z_index_overlay.description: Default z-index for modal and popup overlays.
z_index_overlay.name: z_index_overlay

z_index_mask.title: Z-Index: Mask
z_index_mask.description: Default z-index for masking interface elements.
z_index_mask.name: z_index_mask

line_height_medium.title: Line Height: Medium
line_height_medium.description: Medium line-height is used for the main body text. Basically everything else except the headings and sidebar (and a few other exceptions).
line_height_medium.name: line_height_medium

line_height_small.title: Line Height: Small
line_height_small.description: Small line-height is used for all application headings and text in sidebar.
line_height_small.name: line_height_small

line_height_x_small.title: Line Height: X-Small
line_height_x_small.description: X-small line-height is used when we don’t want the line-height to create any additional white space above or below text.
line_height_x_small.name: line_height_x_small

transition_quickly.title: Transition: Quickly
transition_quickly.description: Use this design token for a quick transition. Most often used for button, link and form input hover effects.
transition_quickly.name: transition_quickly

transition_slowly.title: Transition: Slowly
transition_slowly.description: Use this design token for a slow transition. Used for example in mobile navigation.
transition_slowly.name: transition_slowly

media_query_xxx_large.name: media_query_xxx_large
media_query_xxx_large.title: Media Query: XXX-Large
media_query_xxx_large.description: XXX-Large media query is used to target very large desktop devices from 1700px and up.

media_query_x_large.name: media_query_x_large
media_query_x_large.title: Media Query: X-Large
media_query_x_large.description: X-Large media query is used to target desktop devices from 1025px and up.

media_query_medium.name: media_query_medium
media_query_medium.title: Media Query: Medium
media_query_medium.description: Medium media query is used to target portrait tablets from 768px and up.

media_query_large.name: media_query_large
media_query_large.title: Media Query: Large
media_query_large.description: Large media query is used to target landscape tablets from 992px and up.

media_query_xx_large.name: media_query_xx_large
media_query_xx_large.title: Media Query: XX-Large
media_query_xx_large.description: XX-Large media query is used to target large desktop devices from 1220px and up.

media_query_x_small.name: media_query_x_small
media_query_x_small.title: Media Query: X-Small
media_query_x_small.description: X-Small media query is used to target smaller devices between 0-575px. Remember that in most cases the X-Small media query is rarely needed when building websites mobile first.

media_query_xxx_small.name: media_query_xxx_small
media_query_xxx_small.title: Media Query: XXX-Small
media_query_xxx_small.description: XX-Small media query is used to target devices below 360px. Remember that in most cases the XXX-Small media query is rarely needed when building websites mobile first.

media_query_small.name: media_query_small
media_query_small.title: Media Query: Small
media_query_small.description: Small media query is used to target devices from 576px and up. When working mobile first, this is your first breakpoint when the viewport width grows.

media_query_xx_small.name: media_query_xx_small
media_query_xx_small.title: Media Query: XX-Small
media_query_xx_small.description: XX-Small media query is used to target the smallest devices between 0-360px. Remember that in most cases the XX-Small media query is rarely needed when building websites mobile first.
